lead_paragraph: Over the next few weeks, after long days of training camp on the practice fields of Missouri Western State University, Cairo Santos will return to his dorm room and hunker down in front of a TV.

headline.print_headline: NFL Player Eager to See Show Brazil Puts On at Rio Olympics
headline.main: NFL Player Eager to See Show Brazil Puts On at Rio Olympics
